title.title: Discovering Digital Humanities Methods Through Pedagogy
A Study of Introductory DH Syllabi

author.affiliation: Michigan State University, United States of America

sourceDesc.p: Converted from an OASIS Open Document

keywords.term: curricular and pedagogical development and analysis
meta-criticism (reflections on digital humanities and humanities computing)

body.p: An understanding Digital Humanities as a field is enriched through exploration of the way that it is introduced to students. This presentation reports on a study that examined “Introduction to Digital Humanities” syllabi as a means of discovering the values and methods that shape the field and as a window into the intersection of the research and pedagogy practices of the instructors who teach introductory courses.
